channel.title: CVE Feed for Schneider Electric -- Accutech Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schneider Electric -- Accutech Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-6918|2024-09-03T17:08:31.244Z -- schneider%20electric -- accutech%20manager
item.description: CWE-120: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability exists that could cause a crash of the Accutech Manager when receiving a specially crafted request over port 2536/TCP.

item.title: CVE-2024-6918|2024-08-20T12:11:23.899Z -- schneider%20electric -- accutech%20manager
item.description: CWE-120: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability exists that could cause a crash of the Accutech Manager when receiving a specially crafted request over port 2536/TCP.
